Dragon Vegetarian

Game details
Title Dragon Vegetarian
Created 2016
Team w84death
Genre RPG
Platforms HTML5
Status pre-alpha

Description

First ever game created by the studio. Proof of concept with procedural maps.

Player controls young dragon hatched from the egg. Eating trees gives energy and wood.

  • pixel art graphics
  • procedural maps

contact information
